org.hps.recon.ecal.cluster

Class CopyClusterCollectionDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lcsim.util.Driver
      • org.hps.recon.ecal.cluster.CopyClusterCollectionDriver

  • public class CopyClusterCollectionDriver
extends Driver
    Copy a Cluster collection to a new collection via the BaseCluster class's copy constructor.
